page.description: Specifies how the data should be searched.

case.title: "Wildcard"
case.description: Search for an exact match, ignoring case and length (wildcard characters * and ? are allowed).

case.title: "Exact"
case.description: Search for an exact match, ignoring case and length.

case.title: "Contains"
case.description: Search for value anywhere in field. There is no need to use wildcards in the search string.

case.title: "Starts with"
case.description: Search for the value at the beginning of field. There is no need to use wildcards in the search string.
